name: Clearing in a Forest
description: You are in a small clearing in a dense forest. The grass is crushed flat all around you. There's a small hole in the ground nearby. An overgrown trail leads through the trees to the north. Another dirt path leads to the east.

args: A slight glimmer in the air dissipates as you get your bearings. Before you know it, it's gone.

look: Soft soil is piled next to a 1-foot-wide hole that is only 6 inches deep. Sitting at the bottom of the hole is a baseball.
It's a totally ordinary baseball--though really, REALLY clean.
